actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 824.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution congratulating President Vassiliou, the government, and the people of Cyprus on the thirtieth anniversary of independence.

summary.text: Congratulates Cyprus on the 30th anniversary of its independence. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United States should continue its support of the United Nations Secretary General in his efforts to resolve the Cyprus problem.

titles.title: A resolution congratulating President Vassiliou, the government, and the people of Cyprus on the thirtieth anniversary of independence.
